name: Miratope
description: A renderer for polytopes. Still in alpha.

scripts._bbt: echo Running Browserify + Babelify + Tinyify... & browserify src/js/main.js -o out/main.js -t [ babelify --presets [ @babel/preset-env ] ] -p tinyify & echo Done!
scripts._b: echo Running Browserify... & browserify src/js/main.js -o out/main.js & echo Done!
scripts._c: echo Copying index.html to the project root folder... & copyfiles -u 1 src/index.html ./ & echo Done!
scripts._h: echo Running HTMLMinifier... & html-minifier --input-dir src --output-dir ./ --file-ext html --minify-js true --minify-css true --remove-comments --collapse-whitespace & echo Done!
scripts._htypedoc: echo Running HTMLMinifier... & html-minifier --input-dir out/typedoc --output-dir out/typedoc --file-ext html --minify-js true --minify-css true --remove-comments --collapse-whitespace & echo Done!
scripts.build: npm run tsc & npm run _bbt & npm run _h
scripts.debug: npm run tsc & npm run _b & npm run _c
scripts.typedoc: echo Running TypeDoc... & typedoc src/ts --out out/typedoc & npm run _htypedoc
scripts.eslint: echo Running ESLint... & eslint src/ts/**/*.ts{,x} --fix & echo Done!
scripts.tsc: echo Running TypeScript... & tsc & echo Done!

author: Miratope authors
